channel.name: Comet US
channel.title: The Outer Limits
channel.desc: A soldier inhabits a bunker with doomsday devices as aliens land on Earth.

channel.name: Comet US
channel.title: Space Truckers
channel.desc: A freight pilot (Dennis Hopper), his girlfriend (Debi Mazar) and an apprentice (Stephen Dorff) try to deliver cargo to Earth in 2197.
